4 out of 5 stars.
AWESOME PRODUCT. JUST GO FOR IT.
2 YEARS AGO
Its been 1 week and as a tester I tried every possible connectivity like Game console, Laptop, Set-Top Box, OTTs with internal and External Speakers (LG X-Boom) both. Trust Me, This one is the best you can get in this price range. Very fine 4k scaling and extraordinary sound. Very smooth experience via magic remote. Only thing which i think is not upto the mark is Internet Speed. It goes max upto 70 MBps and refuse to connect to 5G wifi. But not a big issue 60-70 MBps is capable to run any think. eArc is a big Plus. Thanks LG for this super product. I Loved it. :)
